title: Media option dingbats
content:
I'm working on a website for a client that wants to offer various media options with articles in the way newspaper websites often do.

Is there a single font that offers these options as a coherent set:  
- smaller and larger text size options  
- email option (typically an envelope icon)  
- print option (typically a wee printer icon)  
- video camera icon  
- audio (typically a little speaker with waves)

(If not, somebody should. I suspect people are nicking these from each other all over the web.)
author: elzadra

comments.content: OK, I've discovered the web icons from minifonts.com - these might do the trick.
Webdings - certainly looking a bit dated as it's ten years old.
